snippet: A progress report on some shows announced for Broadway that have yet to make their bows, and some of the factors that have caused delays.
abstract: More than a dozen shows that had been announced in 2011 for the 2012 Broadway season did not come together as planned due to problems with financing, casting and finding suitable theater spaces.
lead_paragraph: A progress report on some shows announced for Broadway that have yet to make their bows, and some of the factors that have caused delays.

headline.seo: ‘Yank!’ and Other Shows Delayed but Still Hoping for Broadway
headline.main: You Read It Here First: Plays’ Plans Still in Flux
headline.print_headline: You Read It Here First: Plays’ Plans Still in Flux
